metadata.title: CVE-2024-27406 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:lib/Kconfig.debug: TEST_IOV_ITER depends on MMU Trying to run the iov_iterunit test on a nommu system such as the qemu kc705-nommu emulation resultsin a crash. KTAP version 1 # Subtest: iov_iter # module: kunit_iov_iter1..9 BUG: failure at mm/nommu.c:318/vmap()! Kernel panic - not syncing:BUG! The test calls vmap() directly, but vmap() is not supported on nommusystems, causing the crash. TEST_IOV_ITER therefore needs to depend on MMU.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27406` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
